preface.title: About this Guide
preface.para: This book is part of the official &obs; documentation. toms 2017-08-14: Shouldn't the following sentence be clear (because it's "official" and thus can be removed? These books are considered to contain only reviewed content, establishing the reference documentation of OBS.

These books does not focus on a special &obsa; version. They are also not a replacement of the documentation inside of the &opensuse; Wiki. But content from the wiki may get consolidated and included in these books.

Furthermore these books are written by the &obsa; community. Check the chapter how to work on these books. We request especially experienced users and administrators to join and to contribute to these books. It is not required to be a very good or even native English speaker, because we rely on community editors to improve the language.
